Package characters

Class Butcher

java.lang.Object
characters.MovingCharacter
characters.Butcher
public class Butcher extends MovingCharacter
Class for Butchers on the Board. Will hold images and coordinates for the Butchers(enemies). Will chase Wilbur(player) and if Wilbur gets caught up, Wilbur dies

    • generateNewProbabilities

      public static void generateNewProbabilities(int size)
      Gets new probability ratios for the Butchers to move randomly on the board Generates an array of probabilities to store and use later butcherMoveProb
      Parameters:
      size - the number of butchers to generate probabilities for

    • getButcherProbability

      public static double getButcherProbability(int index)
      Returns the probability of a random move of the Butcher at the specified index in the butcherMoveProb array
      Parameters:
      index - the index corresponding to the probability of a random move in the butcherMoveProb of a Butcher on the board
      Returns:
      the probability of a random move for the Butcher at this index

    • tracking

      public void tracking(Wilbur wilbur, int[][] space, double randomMoveProbability)
      This function is a chasing system for the moving enemies to track the player a probability aspect was implemented so that the butchers would random move for the probability of time, and the rest would move towards Wilbur. The chasing path is decided based on slope of the two characters line, if |slope| > 1, priority to move in vertical direction. if |slope| < 1, priority to move in horizontal direction. This is the graph of all the positions that could happen -----------B----------- | \ B2 | B3 / | | \ | / | | \ | / | | B1 \ | / B4 | B----------W----------B | / | \ | | / | \ | | B8/ | B6 \ B5| | / B7 | \ | -----------B-----------
      Parameters:
      wilbur - the character that needs to be tracking
      space - the space array that hold all the coordinates
      randomMoveProbability - this is the probability that a butcher will move randomly.

    • move

      public boolean move(String direction, int[][] space)
      This function is used for move in one direction and will check whether this direction is movable If this direction is ok to move, will perform the move, if not, will return false and not perform the move the return value can indicate whether this direction is movable
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction chosen from: "up", "down", "right", "left", or "n/a" if no need for the parameter
      space - the spaces array that holds collision and tracking information for the elements on the board
      Returns:
      true is this direction is movable, false if not

    • move

      public void move(String direction1, String direction2, String direction3, String direction4, int[][] space)
      This function is used for move in directions 1 and 2 are required. directions 3 and 4 will be randomly selected of directions 1 and 2 are not movable
      Parameters:
      direction1 - the first preferable direction
      direction2 - the second preferable direction
      direction3 - the third preferable direction. Directions 3 and 4 will be randomly selected of directions 1 and 2 are not movable
      direction4 - the fourth preferable direction. directions 3 and 4 will be randomly selected of directions 1 and 2 are not movable
      space - the location on the board
